participant_1.background:
I'd like to live in the suburbs so I can have a bigger home and a yard for my pets.
I cannot be a professional MMA fighter because I need to see my opponents to fight them.
I adopted my two cats from the local shelter
I want to be more patient with my partner.
i love to binge watch shows on streaming services.

participant_2.background:
My first purchase was a new teaching outfit to inspire my students to love their bodies as much as I love mine.
I love my family, but my pets are my best friends.
i am very social.
I'm really into learning new things and expanding my knowledge.
I sometimes forget to water my plants, but I'm trying to be better about it.

content.text: Hey! I'm looking forward to meeting you. I love to binge watch shows on streaming services. What are some of your favorites?
Hi! I'm so glad to hear that. Me too! Some of my favorites are The Good Place, Parks and Recreation, and Schitt's Creek.
Oh, I love Schitt's Creek! I haven't seen The Good Place or Parks and Recreation. Do you have a favorite episode of Schitt's Creek?
I love all of the episodes, but my favorite is probably the one where David and Moira are stuck in the elevator. It's so funny!
That is one of my favorite episodes too! I love when David is trying to act tough but he's so scared.
Me too! He's such a great character.
I have two cats of my own. What are your pets?
I have a dog and a cat. My dog is a goldendoodle named Buddy and my cat is a tabby named Mittens.
Oh, I love goldendoodles! They're such sweet dogs.
They are! Buddy is the best dog I could ask for.
I'm glad to hear that. I'm sure Mittens is a great cat too.
She is! She's a little bit of a diva, but she's also very sweet.
Well, it sounds like you have a great family. I'm glad to meet you.
Me too! It's nice to meet you too.
